name: search_resource
description: Search certain type of resource from the Harvard Art Museum with numerous parameters as filters.

res_type.description: The type of resource you wish to search(object,person,exhibition,publication,gallery,spectrum,classification,century,color,culture,group,medium,support,period,place,technique,worktype,activity,site,video,image,audio,annotation).

q.description: FIELD:VALUE(varies with resource type) or follow syntax from elastic research.

size.description: Numbers of item on the returned page.

page.description: Limit the page number you wish to see.

sort.description: The principle for sorting search results(in FIELD NAME or "random" or "random:[SEED NUMBER]").

sortorder.description: the order to show search result('asc' or 'desc').

fields.description: Comma separated list of data fields you want in the output.

agg.description: Searching for aggregated data following the standards of aggregation in Elastic Research.

id.description: Pipe separated list of record IDs.

object.description: Object id related to the resource(applicable to activity,object).

image.description: (Only applicable to annotation)id of an image you wish to find annotation for .

usedby.description: (Applicable to century,classification,culture,gallery,group,period,place,support,technique,worktype)resource which you wish to find its attribute(FIELDNAME:ID).

keyword.description: (Applicable to exhibition, object,publication)a keyword search string; this parameter searches exhibition titles, description, and people names related to the creation of the exhibition or a keyword search string; this parameter searches object titles, artists, description, classification, culture, worktype, medium terms, provenance, and creditline or a keyword search string; this parameter searches publication titles, description, and people names related to the creation of the publication.

venue.description: (Applicable to exhibition)where the exhibition is (to be) held(“HAM” or "any" or "none" or VENUE ID or pipe separated list of VENUE IDs or VENUE NAME).

person.description: (Applicable to exhibition,object,publication)PERSON ID or pipe separated list of PERSON IDs or PERSON NAME or "any" or"none".

exact_title.description: (Applicable to exhibition,object)exact url encoded title for the resource.

before.description: (Applicable to exhibition)exhibitions should be held before the date(YYYY-MM-DD).

after.description: (Applicable to exhibition)exhibitions should be held after the date(YYYY-MM-DD).

floor.description: (Applicable to gallery)the floor the entity is in (FLOOR NUMBER or pipe separated list of FLOOR NUMBERS; acceptable floor numbers are 0 through 5).

parent.description: (Applicable to group,medium,place,site)parent range of this resource.

century.description: (Applicable to object)century of the object,CENTURY ID or pipe separated list of CENTURY IDs or CENTURY NAME or pipe separated list of CENTURY NAMES or "any".

classification.description: (Applicable to object)CLASSIFICATION ID or pipe separated list of CLASSIFICATION IDs or CLASSIFICATION NAME or pipe separated list of CLASSIFICATION NAMES or "any".

color.description: (Applicable to object)color of the object(URL encoded COLOR or pipe separated list of URL encoded colors or "any").

culture.description: (Applicable to object)culture the object belongs to (CULTURE ID or pipe separated list of CULTURE IDs or CULTURE NAME or pipe separated list of CULTURE NAMES or "any").

exhibition.description: (Applicable to object)exhibition the object is in (EXHIBITION ID or pipe separated list of EXHIBITION IDs or EXHIBITION TITLE or "any" or "none").

gallery.description: (Applicable to object)GALLERY NUMBER or pipe separated list of gallery numbers or "any" or "none".

medium.description: (Applicable to object)MEDIUM ID or pipe separated list of MEDIUM IDs or MEDIUM NAME or pipe separated list of MEDIUM NAMES or "any".

period.description: (Applicable to object)PERIOD or pipe separated list of periods or "any".

place.description: (Applicable to object)PLACE ID or pipe separated list of PLACE IDs or PLACE NAME or "any" or "none".

publication.description: (Applicable to object)PUBLICATION ID or pipe separated list of PUBLICATION IDs or PUBLICATION TITLE or "any" or "none".

support.description: (Applicable to object)SUPPORT ID or pipe separated list of SUPPORT IDs or SUPPORT NAME or pipe separated list of SUPPORT NAMES or "any".

technique.description: (Applicable to object)TECHNIQUE ID or pipe separated list of TECHNIQUE IDs or TECHNIQUE NAME or pipe separated list of TECHNIQUE NAMES or "any".

worktype.description: (Applicable to exhibition,object)WORKTYPE ID or pipe separated list of WORKTYPE IDs or WORKTYPE NAME or pipe separated list of WORKTYPE NAMES or "any".

hasimage.description: (Applicable to exhibition,object,publication)whether this resource has image(0 or 1).

name: get_resource_by_id
description: get a certain resource by its unique id

name: get_resource_in_iiif
description: get certain resource information by its unique id,returns in iiif standards

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
